name: Fish of Fortune
description:
Embark on a new adventure and spin the wheel of fortune to get coins and unlock magical sea creatures. Win rewards, catch fish, raid, loot and attack your friends as you restore and redecorate different areas of the island. Enjoy this arcade adventure game with the fisherman and his crew

Are you looking to play multiplayer games with friends online?! In Fish of Fortune, you can play alone or interact with other players! Come and build your dream island now! Get started and spin the wheel!

Fish of Fortune is not your average online fishing game. Enjoy this thrilling island adventure game with fishing mechanics, where you can raid, loot, collect coins, and spin the wheel!

Spin to earn your loot!
Spin the wheel to fall on your fortune, be it attack time, loot, shields or raids. Win your loot by landing on coins so you can build amazing islands through the game and move up in levels. Win shields to guard your island from other players trying to attack you. Become the Fortune King with the strongest island and the most loot!

Earn free coins!
Collect coins when you spin the wheel and use them to build and decorate different islands and areas of the universe. Feeling lazy? Use the autospin mode to collect as many coins as you can! Attack and raid friends to steal their coins!

Collect all the Fish Cards!
It's not always about the loot, it's about the treasure too! When you spin the wheel, you can collect and upgrade dozens of cards featuring the Fish of Fortune characters : Steal Fish, Blast Attack Crab, Energy Turtle, Gold Whale and many more!

Let the raid games commence!
Spinning the wheel isn’t the only way to win free coins! Attack, raid and steal from your friends instead! You can loot treasures and coins on someone else’s island! Become the champion of this exciting multiplayer adventure game!

Play with friends!
Aside from having the Fisherman and the penguins with you, you can win coins by spinning the wheel and by blasting and raiding your friend's island. Attack their islands and steal coins! Make your island the strongest there is with the most loot!
Join our fast growing interactive Facebook community to play together, meet new friends, earn big rewards, and trade treasures!

Follow Fish of Fortune on Facebook for exclusive offers and bonuses!

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/FishOfFortune

* Spin the wheel to win BIG prizes
* Use coins to restore, upgrade and decorate different areas of your island
* Attack, raid and loot your friends’ islands
* Unlock new cards and characters as you progress in the story
* Riley will be your guide and Otter will be your lovely pet so you will never be alone

Are you having problems?
Please contact us in the game by clicking on the menu > Settings > Support or email us at support@whalo.com
